//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "sitting_guy", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "DEFAULT" );
	set ( "SET_VIEWDIST", 1.000 );

	loop ( -1 )
	{

		task ( "Use" )
		{
			set ( "SET_TASK", "Inventory" );
			set ( "SET_INVENTORY_ACTION", "Use" );
		}

		dowait ( "Use" );

		task ( "Throw" )
		{
			set ( "SET_TASK", "Inventory" );
			set ( "SET_INVENTORY_ACTION", "Throw" );
		}

		dowait ( "Throw" );
		wait ( 2000.000 );
	}

}
